name: gruff
description: Entity-Relationship Graph Database with Versioning on Cloudflare Workers + D1

scripts.migrate:local: wrangler d1 execute gruff-db --local --file=./migrations/0001_initial_schema.sql && wrangler d1 execute gruff-db --local --file=./migrations/0002_version_triggers.sql
scripts.migrate:remote: wrangler d1 execute gruff-db --remote --file=./migrations/0001_initial_schema.sql && wrangler d1 execute gruff-db --remote --file=./migrations/0002_version_triggers.sql
